basics.name: Ghislain Delabie
basics.label: AI Engineer
basics.summary: Digital-innovation and sustainable-mobility professional (18 years' experience) now pivoting to AI engineering: audits, prototype design and end-to-end machine-learning POCs for public- and private-sector clients.

work.name: Self-employed
work.summary: Audit, design and delivery of AI use-cases and prototypes for diverse industries.
highlights: Performed AI-readiness audits to identify high-value business cases.
Built end-to-end machine-learning POCs: data sourcing, model training, integration testing.
Improved clients’ digital-service personalisation, automation and performance.

work.name: Moovance
work.summary: Advisor on business development and public-sector product strategy.
highlights: Led B2G business-development and stakeholder engagement.
Product Owner for the B2G offering: roadmap definition, feature prioritisation and pilot supervision.

work.name: La Fabrique des Mobilités
work.summary: Independent contractor providing thematic workshops, webinars and technical expertise on mobility data and AI projects.

work.name: La Fabrique des Mobilités
work.summary: Managed open-innovation programmes for sustainable mobility.
highlights: Mentored a cross-functional team of five project leads and senior experts.
Designed and piloted green-mobility projects with government agencies, operators, startups and NGOs.
Secured stakeholder buy-in, managed implementation and measured impact.

work.name: Manwë
work.summary: Founded and ran a consulting firm specialised in integrated multimodal-mobility services for urban-development projects.

work.name: Ouishare
work.summary: Led collaborative projects on digital services and sustainable mobility.
highlights: Co-created projects with cities, corporates, startups and NGOs to improve urban accessibility and reduce environmental impact.

work.name: Techneo
work.summary: Built a new consulting line on low-carbon mobility.

work.name: Deways
work.summary: Led innovation projects with PSA, La Poste and Renault.

teaching.name: ESTACA Engineering School
teaching.summary: Delivered thematic workshops and technical mentoring on data & AI for mobility projects.
